title: Simple Watch Face Collection
summary: A collection of simple watch faces for Android Wear - requires Android Wear 5.0+
description:
Perimeter: A new take on the analog style with watch battery remaining and a subtle hint of material design.
Combo Breaker: Combining the best of both analog and digital interfaces - a large hour digit in the center with an outer edge minute ticker.
Outer Analog: A minimalistic analog face featuring an empty center with analog dials along the outer minute/hour tickers.
Jelly Time: A digital face (with customizable digits color) powered by the Roboto font introduced in Android Jelly Bean.
* requires Android Wear 5.0+ *
descriptionHTML:
Perimeter: A new take on the analog style with watch battery remaining and a subtle hint of material design.


Combo Breaker: Combining the best of both analog and digital interfaces - a large hour digit in the center with an outer edge minute ticker.


Outer Analog: A minimalistic analog face featuring an empty center with analog dials along the outer minute/hour tickers.


Jelly Time: A digital face (with customizable digits color) powered by the Roboto font introduced in Android Jelly Bean.


* requires Android Wear 5.0+ *
comments: Great...simple, yet thoughtful.  Would love to see color options though.  And maybe an option to change the length of the minute hand.
No 24 hour digital clock, only 12 hour
